Overview Open source software used in MPicture Permissions Contact us Access Network State Internet Set Wallpaper Write External Storage
MPicture is a content platform, and personalization. People use MPicture to see others picture in the world, to make smartphones more personal using wallpapers.
Markushi UI Firebase Picasso Glide
Since MPicture are loading content from our servers you need to have an active network connection. This permission will allow us to see if you are connected or not.
This permission allows MPicture internet access to load content from our servers.
Allows you to set a wallpaper from within the app.
Allows you to save the content you download from MPicture onto your phone.
Please send us your feedback
Do you have challenges with the app or suggestions for improvements? Press the button below to be taken to your preferred email client and let us know.
Note: Non personal information that can help us to debug will be include in the message.
